bug.short_desc: SELinux is preventing tgtd from using the 'wake_alarm' capabilities.
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: This AVC appears on starting `tgtd.service` after defining a target in `/etc/tgt/conf.d/` - basically, setting the system up as an iSCSI 'server' and starting it up. SELinux is preventing tgtd from using the 'wake_alarm' capabilities.
***** Plugin catchall (100. confidence) suggests **************************
If you believe that tgtd should have the wake_alarm capability by default. Then you should report this as a bug. You can generate a local policy module to allow this access. Do allow this access for now by executing: # ausearch -c 'tgtd' --raw | audit2allow -M my-tgtd # semodule -X 300 -i my-tgtd.pp
Additional Information: Source Context system_u:system_r:tgtd_t:s0 Target Context system_u:system_r:tgtd_t:s0 Target Objects Unknown [ capability2 ] Source tgtd Source Path tgtd Port <Unknown> Host (removed) Source RPM Packages Target RPM Packages Policy RPM selinux-policy-3.13.1-216.fc25.noarch Selinux Enabled True Policy Type targeted Enforcing Mode Enforcing Host Name (removed) Platform Linux (removed) 4.8.0-0.rc7.git0.1.fc25.x86_64 #1 SMP Mon Sep 19 15:24:06 UTC 2016 x86_64 x86_64 Alert Count 2 First Seen 2016-10-27 10:25:41 PDT Last Seen 2016-10-27 10:25:41 PDT Local ID b437b015-a032-4898-bdd6-7c7714a3c6b9
Raw Audit Messages type=AVC msg=audit(1477589141.190:210): avc: denied { wake_alarm } for pid=1988 comm="tgtd" capability=35 scontext=system_u:system_r:tgtd_t:s0 tcontext=system_u:system_r:tgtd_t:s0 tclass=capability2 permissive=0
Hash: tgtd,tgtd_t,tgtd_t,capability2,wake_alarm
Version-Release number of selected component: selinux-policy-3.13.1-216.fc25.noarch
Additional info: reporter: libreport-2.8.0 hashmarkername: setroubleshoot kernel: 4.8.0-0.rc7.git0.1.fc25.x86_64 type: libreport

Description of problem:
Just as #bz1399048: chcon -t tgtd_var_lib_t /srv/iscsi/disk1.img and "systemctl start tgtd" Get these two AVCs after "systemctl start tgtd"
Version-Release number of selected component: selinux-policy-3.13.1-224.fc25.noarch
Additional info: reporter: libreport-2.8.0 hashmarkername: setroubleshoot kernel: 4.8.6-300.fc25.x86_64 type: libreport
